title: How Many Teams Can Win the Super Bowl? | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Kevin is joined by The Ringer’s Danny Kelly and Kaelen Jones to list their tiers of teams that could win the Super Bowl in 2020 and break down what those teams need to do to get there. They begin by discussing the Chiefs, 49ers, Ravens, and Saints before talking about the fringe teams that could make the leap this season.
Host: Kevin Clark
Guest: Danny Kelly and Kaelen Jones

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
